data.text: O! Yehowa, ɖo to nye nyawo,
O! Yehowa, le ŋdi me la, àse nye gbe;
Menye Mawu si kpɔa dzidzɔ le vɔ̃ ŋutie nènye o;
Ɖokuiŋudzelawo mate ŋu atsi tsitre ɖe ŋkuwò me o;
Ke nye ya, mava wò aƒe me to wò nublanuikpɔkpɔ gã la me.
Womate ŋu axɔ nya siwo doa go tso
Ke na ame siwo si wò tso la nakpɔ dzidzɔ,
O! Yehowa, èyraa ame dzɔdzɔewo vavã,
